type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

invoice-head.WeightUnitCode: Weight unit code for the entire invoice
invoice-head.DimensionsUnitCode: Dimensions unit code for the entire invoice
invoice-head.VolumeUnitCode: Volume unit code for the entire invoice
invoice-head.OriginalCopy: Original by default otherwise Copy needs to be indicated
invoice-head.PeriodStartDate: Start date of the invoicing period
invoice-head.PeriodEndDate: End date of the invoicing period
invoice-head.AvailabilityDateTime: Date and time of availability of goods for pickup at origin
invoice-head.DeliveryDateTime: Date and time at which the delivery is scheduled to take place
invoice-head.CustomsReferenceNumber: Unique identification number assigned by the Customs to the Invoice (e.g. UCR)

invoice-reference-document.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

invoice-currency.BaseCurrency: Base or origin currency - ISO alpha 3 code
invoice-currency.TargetCurrency: Target or destination currency - ISO alpha 3 code
invoice-currency.ExchangeRateFor1BaseUnit: Amount of target currency for 1 unit of base currency - e.g. [amount in base currency] x [exchange rate] = [amount in target currency]

invoice-incoterms.IncotermsCode: Standard code as defined by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC)

Location.Type: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…
Location.CodeIssuer: Location code issuer - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…
Location.Code: Location code of city, airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
Location.Name: Full name of the location / facility

invoice-freight-terms.Description: Full text description of freight terms

invoice-seller.Name: Name of company or organization
invoice-seller.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
invoice-seller.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-shipper.Name: Name of company or organization
invoice-shipper.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
invoice-shipper.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-buyer.Name: Name of company or organization
invoice-buyer.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
invoice-buyer.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-consignee.Name: Name of company or organization
invoice-consignee.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
invoice-consignee.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-other-party.Role: Other party's role - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

Company.Name: Name of company or organization
Company.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
Company.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-product-line.ChargeType: Charge type - e.g. ITM for Item, PCK for Packing, FRT for Freight charge, INS for Insurance charge for invoice charges breakdown

ReferenceDocument.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the product identifer - e.g. UPC, EAN, Amazon…

CommodityCode.Issuer: Issuer of the Commodity Code - e.g. Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard International Trade…

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

Characteristic.Value: Product characteristic value / attribute - e.g. Blue…

Price.UnitPrice: Product price per unit in the base currency
Price.UnitCode: Unit code for item - e.g. piece, unit, kg, pack, hour, minute…
Price.QuantityForUnitPrice: Product quantity for unit price - e.g. 12 (eggs for one USD 1)

invoice-product-line.SubTotalAmount: Product subtotal before discount and tax - CALCULATED: Quantity x UnitPrice / QuantityForUnitPrice

Discount.BaseAmount: Amount on which the discount is calculated - CALCULATED:  = SubTotalAmount
Discount.Amount: Discount amount - CALCULATED: BaseAmount x Percent
Discount.Description: Discount reason description - e.g. Christmas Sale
Discount.TotalDiscountAmount: Total discount amount - CALCULATED: Amount + OtherAmount

Tax.BaseAmount: Amount on which tax is applied - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - TotalDiscountAmount
Tax.Category: Tax category - e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax (and by implication, the rate that applies, the actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction)
Tax.TotalTaxAmount: Tax amount - CALCULATED: BaseAmount x Percent

invoice-product-line.TotalAmount: Total line amount after discount and tax - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - TotalDiscountAmount + TotalTaxAmount

Item.ItemQuantity: Item quantity - e.g. 1 for items with precise serial numbers (e.g. smartphones) or more for bulk items with quantity units in weight instead of items (e.g. tomatoes…)

ItemID.SerialNumber: If applicable, individual product serial number for each product of the current line

OtherID.Type: Identifier type or description - e.g. wifi mac address, bluetooth address…

Production.ProductExpiryDate: Product expiry date - e.g. for perishables goods or goods with programmed obsolescence

invoice-movement.Type: Movement type - e.g. Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage or On-Carriage. Always defaults to Main-Carriage.
invoice-movement.ModeCode: Mode of transport code following UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport

CarrierCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
CarrierCompany.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-movement.FlightNumberLineID: Airline flight number or rail/truck/maritime line id

TransportEquipment.RegistrationID: Vehicle identification - e.g. vehicle registration number
TransportEquipment.Type: Vehicle or container type following United Nations Directories for Electronic Data Interchange Code List
TransportEquipment.Size: Size of the vehicle - free text

Loading.DateTime: Date and time at which the goods are loaded onto the vehicle

LoadingCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
LoadingCompany.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
LoadingCompany.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
LoadingCompany.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

LoadingLocation.Type: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…
LoadingLocation.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…
LoadingLocation.Code: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
LoadingLocation.Name: Location name

LoadingAddress.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

GeoLocation.DockElevationMetric: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level
GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

Departure.DateTime: Date and time at which the vehicule carrying the goods is departing

DepartureLocation.Type: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…
DepartureLocation.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…
DepartureLocation.Code: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
DepartureLocation.Name: Location name

DepartureAddress.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

GeoLocation.DockElevationMetric: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level
GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

Arrival.DateTime: Date and time at which the vehicle carrying the goods is arriving

ArrivalLocation.Type: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…
ArrivalLocation.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…
ArrivalLocation.Code: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
ArrivalLocation.Name: Location name

ArrivalAddress.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

GeoLocation.DockElevationMetric: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level
GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

Unloading.DateTime: Date and time at which the goods are offloaded from the vehicle

UnloadingCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
UnloadingCompany.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
UnloadingCompany.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
UnloadingCompany.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located

OtherCompany.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

OtherEventLocation.Code: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
OtherEventLocation.Name: Location name

OtherAddress.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

GeoLocation.DockElevationMetric: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level
GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

PieceID.ShipperPieceID: Unique piece identifier from the shipper
PieceID.UPIDIssuer: Issuer of the UPID identifier - e.g. GS1…
PieceID.UPID: Unique Piece Identifier for the piece / package - e.g. GS1 SSCC-18 code
PieceID.ShippingMarks: Free text the marks and / or numbers shown on a piece / package / pallet / ULD

ReferenceDocument.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

Goods.ContentDescription: General description of the piece contents (not a detailed description of products / items / articles contained within)
Goods.CustomsOriginCode: Customs transit status / information / reference / code

PackageType.Code: Packaging type identifier as per UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II
PackageType.Description: Packaging type description as per UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II

ULD.Type: Standard Unit Load Device type code
ULD.ATAdesignator: US / ATA Unit Load Device type code
ULD.LoadingIndicator: ULD height or loading limitation code
ULD.OwnerCodeIssuer: Issuer of the ULD owner code
ULD.OwnerCode: Owner code of the ULD in aa, an or na format - owner can be an airline or leasing company

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-piece.SLAC: Shipper's Load And Count - number of individual pieces provided by the shipper (loose, palletized or in the ULD)

Weight.NetWeight: Net weight of the contents of the piece / package
Weight.TareWeight: Weight of empty packaging, pallet or ULD for the piece
Weight.GrossWeight: Total weight of piece / package / pallet / ULD

LinkedMovement.SequenceNumber: Sequence number of the movement for this piece
LinkedMovement.SpaceAllocationDetails: Space allocation request / action / confirmation code or details

invoice-insurance.PayingParty: Party covering the insurance - e.g. Consignor, Consignee, Freight Forwarder…

InsuranceCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
InsuranceCompany.ID: Company's unique identifier at insurance company
InsuranceCompany.AccountNumber: Company's account number at insurance company
InsuranceCompany.LegalRegistrationNumber: Insurance company's legal registration number at the specified address
InsuranceCompany.TaxID: Insurance company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-insurance.InsuredAmount: Insured amount - amount covered by the insurance policy
invoice-insurance.Charge: Insurance charge - e.g. amount billed by the insurance company for the insurance policy

invoice-payment-means.IDIssuer: Issuer of the payment means codes - e.g. EDIFACT list 4461
invoice-payment-means.PaymentTermIDIssuer: Indicates the Payment Terms issuer. Ex. UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List.
invoice-payment-means.PaymentTermID: Indicates the Payment Terms code, e.g. from the UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

Bank.Name: Name of bank
Bank.BankIdentiferCode: Bank Identifier Code (BIC) or SWIFT code
Bank.BankSortCode: Bank Sort Number assigned to the branch of the bank

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

invoice-payment-terms.IDIssuer: Issuer of payment terms codes - UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List
invoice-payment-terms.ID: Payment Terms code - e.g. UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List
invoice-payment-terms.AmountPayable: Invoice payable amount at the due date
invoice-payment-terms.DiscountDueDate: Invoice payment earlier due date to qualify for the payment discount
invoice-payment-terms.DiscountPercent: Invoice payment discount % if paid at the discount due date or earlier
invoice-payment-terms.DiscountAmount: Invoice payment discount amount if paid at the discount due date or earlier

ChargeTypeBreakdown.TotalItemCharges: Total of product lines where ChargeType=ITM
ChargeTypeBreakdown.TotalPackingCharges: Total of product lines where ChargeType=PCK
ChargeTypeBreakdown.TotalFreightCharges: Total of product lines where ChargeType=FRT
ChargeTypeBreakdown.TotalInsuranceCharges: Total of product lines where ChargeType=INS

TaxBreakdown.TotalBaseAmount: Total of product line BaseAmount for this tax rate
TaxBreakdown.Category: Tax category - e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax (and by implication, the rate that applies, the actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction)
TaxBreakdown.TotalTaxAmount: Total of product line TaxAmount for this tax rate

Piece.TotalULDCount: Total count of Piece lines with ULD description
Piece.TotalNetWeight: Total goods net weight (sum of pieces net weight)
Piece.TotalTareWeight: Total tare weight (sum of pieces tare weight)
Piece.TotalGrossWeight: Total goods gross weight (sum of pieces gross weight)
Piece.TotalVolume: Total goods volume (sum of pieces volume)

PaymentTerms.TotalLineCount: Total number of payment terms lines
